body_html: Should we actually worry about negative "leaks"? (I guess it could be that some external GC is going on when the test is being run.) Maybe we should only check when the memory usage is increased, but ignore it when usage is decreased?
body_text: Should we actually worry about negative "leaks"? (I guess it could be that some external GC is going on when the test is being run.) Maybe we should only check when the memory usage is increased, but ignore it when usage is decreased?
body: Should we actually worry about negative "leaks"? (I guess it could be that some external GC is going on when the test is being run.) Maybe we should only check when the memory usage is increased, but ignore it when usage is decreased?
